text: @SenSchumer Neither does @GovernorTomWolf nor @SecretaryLevine who apparently knows a thing or two about kids’ eating disorders but absolutely nothing about infectious diseases & pandemics Both a disgrace! So yup! @SenSchumer we feel your pain!! #COVID19
